# SCNParticleEvent.birth

**Case**

Occurs when new particles spawn.

## Declaration

```swift
case birth
```

## Discussion

Use a handler for this event to override the initial properties of each particle.

## Constants

- **SCNParticleEvent.death**: Occurs when particles reach the end of their life span.
- **SCNParticleEvent.collision**: Occurs when particles collide with scene geometry.
